list_definition.definition: to begin to employ (a workman etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He engaged him as his assistant.
He has engaged an entertainer for the children’s party.

list_definition.definition: to take hold of or hold fast; to occupy

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He tried to engage her attention.
The two armies were fiercely engaged in battle.

list_definition.mean_english: làm cho ăn khớp với nhau
